text: Pyramid Gang Records (originally Pyramid Gang Entertainment) is an American independent multi-genre record label distribution, publishing and management company based in North Alabama with a second office in Atlanta, GA. The company was founded in 2011 and established in 2014 by young serial entrepreneur Jahmirris "Jay" Smith. Today, It operates in Atlanta, Georgia with affiliations with other prominent independent record labels like its subsidiary Pyramid Gang Records which houses artist like King Montiez, Mizzle Money, Lil Ressie and artist that are housed under their own labels. with music being distributed across platforms such as iTunes, Google Play, Amazon, Deezer, Spotify, SoundCloud, and Rdio, along with physical CDs and vinyl being distributed to traditional record stores. == See also == * List of record labels ==References== ==External links== *Pyramid Gang Entertainment home page *Facebook page *Twitter page *Instagram page Category: American record labels Category:2014 establishments in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:American companies established in 2014
title: Pyramid Gang Records
